website_summaries.verdict: This unique two-piece blue and white set is ideal for gifting. It’s a budget-friendly option with two popular bakeware sizes.
pros: Versatile baking trays cook pasta, chicken, meat, and vegetables evenly
Unlike some other painted ceramic dishes, these pieces are dishwasher safe
Easy replacement policy with responsive customer service
Can be left on display as decoration
cons: Doesn’t come with lids, so you’d need to cover with plastic wrap in the refrigerator

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The baking dishes were pretty, but much smaller than described. I've attached a description from the item that was NOT. The 'lasagna' dish was smaller than 9 × 13.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: I give this a four-star but a 5 in every other aspect because it's not dishwasher safe, the paint starts to wear off
customer_reviews.author: alexis weathington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fragile
customer_reviews.text: It cracked in the oven while baking at 400 F. This was during my second use, and the cracks have increased since then as you can see in my photo (less than 2 months of use). I’ll leave you to make the choice of buying or not.
customer_reviews.author: Ophir

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful porcelain oven trays
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love these trays. They are a bit smaller than expected but they are very beautiful and very sturdy. I showed a photo of me using it for cooking. They are very sturdy so I believe they can last for long time. We are happy with this purchase. The packaging was done perfectly to protect the porcelain trays. Highly recommended. The pricing is also very good!!!
customer_reviews.author: LinDream Skin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and my family loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and very well made!! I love Pyrex for my casseroles but these are so lovely to have out when you have people coming over for dinner. I have seen similar sets on home shopping networks and the prices were insane half the time..so this set is truly a bargain and quality is outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love to bake and these dishes are so awesome. The dishes are microwave, dishwasher and oven safe. I have plans to bake all weekend
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Decorative dish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to use as with my frienship bamboo because they are so beautiful. I cannot tell you about baking.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Settle

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love how pretty it is. It’s easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 11 x 7 baking dish. This does the trick even though it is not as tall as I imagined. The extra disk at this price was a bonus! Both are very sturdy and wash up beautifully. I wish more products from this company were on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre Bence

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well and the “artwork” on casserole dishes is pretty. The dimensions however, are not accurate, especially the smaller casserole dish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with them
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful. I'm very impressed with the old world style. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Andrew DeCree

customer_reviews.title: Small actual baking area but still finding a use for them
customer_reviews.text: Ok now while I do really like these dishes they are not a true size for most dishes. Because of the wavy sides they are smaller on the interior so not great for baking desserts and some casseroles. Now I can and do use them when I am just tossing a few things together to make a dish. They work well for smaller portion veggies and some of my chicken dishes bake evenly in them. Could use them for serving things you baked in other dish if you want a really fancy spread. I have found I am using them mainly for smaller rice and veggie dishes lately.
customer_reviews.author: 💜I Love Jellybeans

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Ceramic Baking Set!
customer_reviews.text: KINGSBULL HOME Bakeware Ceramic Baking Set is a 2-piece baking pan set, porcelain baking dish that is great for baking casseroles, chicken and roasting vegetables. These ceramic baking sets have a wavy design and black hand painted flower pattern that is unique and beautiful! The baking dishes are made of durable ceramic material, can resist high temperature when you are baking. They are safe and reliable. These baking trays are suitable for pizza, bread, spaghetti, chicken, meat, roasting, vegetables, storing and reheating and etc. These baking dishes are high quality and dishwater safe. This product is perfect for gifting or personal use! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Casserole time!
customer_reviews.text: This bakeware set is a beautiful addition to any kitchen and person that loves casseroles and bread loaf baking! These would make an excellent thanksgiving serving set for the table or as a wedding gift. They wash easily and can hold and bake all sorts of baked foods. These have a beautiful rose stenciling which makes them extra lovely and unique, but also not something you’d want to place in the dishwasher. So that would be the one drawback, if there was one. Otherwise, these are a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice change from the 9x13 pyrex casserole dish.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: These baking/serving dishes dress up any meal you make in them. They have a nice finish and clean easily. The different sizes give you flexibility in use. They stack well and store easily. Overall a nice addition to any kitchen. Would make a great gift. Cons: They are a bit harder to get out of a hot oven without the handles. The large dish is slightly smaller than a normal 9 x 13 so if your recipe normally fills a 9 x 13 to near the top you may have place a pan under it in the oven.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Ceramic Baking Set
customer_reviews.text: The KINGSBULL 2-Piece Ceramic Baking Set looks absolutely fantastic. The shiny dark blue color on the outside along with the white flowers makes this baking set look expensive. I really like the inside of these dishes too. The white with the painted blue flowers is really sharp. I measured each, and they are exactly as advertised. I am impressed with how smooth the finish is. You definitely will not want to drop these as they are ceramic. They were packaged well and arrived in perfect condition. These are great baking dishes.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, But Small
customer_reviews.text: I received these in a pretty blue color, which I'm happy about because I think they are more attractive than the black. These pans are smaller than I thought they would be from the description. It's fine if you don't need a specific size, but not fine if you do. Lots of recipes call for 13 x 9" baking pans, for example, and this one won't work. Other than that, they are heavy and well-made and make a pretty presentation. They are supposed to be dishwasher safe, but I prefer to hand wash.
customer_reviews.author: JJL

customer_reviews.title: Works great in oven
customer_reviews.text: Loving this set of ceramic baking dishes. They work really well in the oven and then clean up spotlessly. Baking dishes are great for casseroles or other baked dishes because the pan stays warm looking after you remove it from the oven, so food stays warm while you are serving. The little dish works great for baked mac and cheese on a small scale. Dishes are very pretty and decorative, but also very functional, which is a hard combination to find.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and strong.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't recommend using these every day. They are too pretty to use often and risk breaking or damaging. Instead, I plan to use these for special occasions and holidays. They are absolutely beautiful and I can't wait to show them off this year if the quarantine is lifted by then. So happy with these. Something I hope to give to my daughter someday. They are very nice for casseroles. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Thraddash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pans
customer_reviews.text: The baking pans in this set are beautiful enough to use for decorations, but they are fantastic for baking. I used it to make a meatloaf and it came out so good. I haven't used the smaller one yet but I have no doubt that it will be every bit as good as the larger pan. The pans seem to be made very finely: top notch quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: ~ I love this KINGSBULL HOME Bakeware Ceramic Baking Set 2-Piece Baking Pans Porcelain set! It looks great...and it works as expected with a fairly easy clean up. I actually use this as both a baking dish and a serving dish I am comfortable serving from -it's just that table ready! I have no complaint it is well made, well priced, looks great and should work with most kitchen themes!
customer_reviews.author: K-cee Kit

customer_reviews.title: Look beautiful! Ideal size for a small family
customer_reviews.text: These baking pans look beautiful and come in two different sizes that are ideal for my family of 4. I use the biggest one for lasagna and the smallest for my broccoli casserole and they work great. I washed the first time on the washing machine, but after reading a few reviews saying the color fades a little, I have been washing mine by hand. So far they look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty and can be used as serving dishes as well as baking dishes. The smaller of the two is a great size for baking and serving stuffing or-a big pile of mashed potatoes or roasted vegetables. Stuffed shells came out great in the larger dish and cleaned fairly easily. Nice enough to gift
customer_reviews.author: Solana

customer_reviews.title: Loooveee it!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Nicer that in the pictures! They are strong and I love the sizes, I have allergies and have to cook double the small mold is perfect for me. The flowers is a lovely design and touch that will make the table look nicer. They feel stronger and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Neris

customer_reviews.title: Heavy baking dish very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very well. Color is black and cream. There are 2 dishes. One is an 8 by 11 and the other is a smaller is 9 by 5. Can go from oven to table and still look very nice or these can even just be serving dishes so they do double duty.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Pinson

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous dishes
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous pieces of cookware Great for deviled eggs and salads Love the design and the colors Will order again Food doesn't stick...love love...the best...
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Burke

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made baking dishes !
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty baking dishes . Beautifully made and are very solid, heavy duty .
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful! Very thick material and perfect for a somewhat fancy dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty casserole dishes
customer_reviews.text: I love these casserole dishes. The small one is very small. They are quite heavy.
customer_reviews.author: B. Crimm

customer_reviews.title: B  U  T  F U L 🥰❗️
customer_reviews.text: KINGSBULL HOME makes great porcelain bakeware. It’s reminiscent of the heavy, quality stuff my grandmother used 100+ years ago, minus the lead😉 The country blue color is just perfect in our newly remodeled kitchen and the scalloped edges are a lovely, welcome enhancement. As other reviewers have mentioned, the inside dimensions are smaller than what’s advertised by approximately 1/3 - 1/2 inch. That will matter if you’re doing exacting baking but for our family style, southern-country approach, y’all just come; it’ll be fine♥️ All things considered, nostalgic bakeware, quality product, great value - LET’s COOK✨
customer_reviews.author: linda galella

customer_reviews.title: KINGBULL HOME Ceramic Bakeware Set – a fine set
customer_reviews.text: Viewers of PBS TV no doubt have seen professional cooks like Emeril Lagasse and Martha Stewart, among others, prepare large sizes of sumptuous lasagna, cornbread and other dishes in ceramic bakeware similar to the KINGSBULL HOME bakeware set under review here. Some have short handles but these two have none and call for use with oven gloves. Food in the larger of the two black and white bakeware can feed a family of six. Its walls are also thicker. I was going to keep the fine set for myself but will now give it to a young lady about to get hitched as part of her wedding gift package.
customer_reviews.author: Big Miles Davis Fan

customer_reviews.title: rather small, but pretty
customer_reviews.text: The dishes are rather smaller than I thought they will be, but they are pretty. I like the colors. They are totally not hand painted at all, it is all machine made or at least they used a stamp or something. You did not expect hand painted at this price, did you? The blue design seems to be covered with glaze, so I guess, it is less likely to have lead and other bad stuff. It is not stamped on the surface. I like how cute and innocent the baking dishes look.
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: Blue Floral Pattern
customer_reviews.text: This set of blue dishes was perfect for a recent dish. I made a corn tortilla enchilada casserole and the larger size was just right. Since it is wavy, it is less than a regular 9x13 pan, and the slightly smaller area was what I needed. A straight edge 9x13 pan would have not worked; the dish would have been too loose. The smaller pan is a good size for dips that need to be heated, as it is okay for the oven and microwave. Clean up was a breeze too!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Settje

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: Good: -I love the black and white color. -The design is unique and beautiful. -I really like that you get two different sizes. Bad: -The product page mentions that they are dishwasher safe, however no instructions on cleaning and maintenance were included with the product. -The large dish does not sit level. The unique color and design compliment many styles. I think these baking dishes are very useful for the kitchen or decorating throughout the home.
customer_reviews.author: Keppy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This KINGSBULL HOME Bakeware Ceramic Baking Set 2-Piece Baking Pans Set look exactly as they do in the photos in Amazon. I haven’t had any issues with it being washed in the dishwasher. I just make sure that it’s not a full load where other dishes rub up on it, as I think that would be a cause for it to chip. They appear to be well made, and nicely designed. Although they’re not as great as my Polish pottery, these are great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Great presentation for dinner parties
customer_reviews.text: These are great baking pans. Not only do I use this for lasagna and other baked pastas & vegetables, it also looks great at the dinner table. It's great for dinner parties as its design is different from the rest of the plates and pans. Since it is ceramic, I do have to be more careful when putting away or putting down because it could easily chip. So far, I'm happy with it and it's been easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dawgs Fam

customer_reviews.title: GORGEOUS!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are beautiful. A truly gorgeous pattern. They say they're dishwasher safe, but I'm not sure if I'm willing to risk it so I'll stick with hand washing. The only thing I don't love is that the bigger one seems smaller than it's supposed to be, and it says not to heat over 400. I have a few dishes that call for 425-450 and it makes me anxious to use them on those recipes. Otherwise, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Baldwin BBU

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: The pair is nice. The larger of the two is more useful in size. Both have top notch porcelain that cleans easily. The sides have a gentle wave pattern to it. The decorations make it special and give it a higher end look. Can recommend these wholeheartedly!
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Really pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy and attractive. I really like that they are textured all around the sides for better grip. I do feel like the smaller pan is a little small for cooking for a family of 4, it would make a nice meatloaf for about two people, with possibly a little bit of left-overs.
customer_reviews.author: Cross-eyed cat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 👏🏼👏🏼
customer_reviews.text: These ceramic molds are beautiful, their design and color is beautiful. They are very robust, which helps them not break easily. I was able to make a lasagna and a cake without it sticking. I am very pleased and to bake what you want
customer_reviews.author: Ana Figueroa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Pretty pattern, nice weight to them. They’re a little smaller than I expected but other than that they are very nice
customer_reviews.author: Judith A

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Practical
customer_reviews.text: The bigger pan is right for a casserole or lasagna. The other is a small loaf pan practical for many baking options. The design on the pans I received is black and white and attractive, pretty for a casual dinner party.
customer_reviews.author: Word Lover

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Dishes!
customer_reviews.text: These baking dishes are even prettier in person. The small one is very very small however. Great for serving platters as well. I love them and get asked about them whenever I take them to parties!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design | easy to clean | giftable
customer_reviews.text: This set of baking pans is amazing. They're beautifully painted and would match well with navy or white kitchenware. The big one is for lasagna and the smaller one is all purpose. Would be great wedding or Xmas gifts... Or for keeping for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Nenia Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully designed and constructed!
customer_reviews.text: We've used these several times already, and absolutely adore them. We've been cooking so much more at home, lately, so these really came in handy. Totally recommended for durability and artistic value.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: This two piece set is elegant and versatile. The larger dish is for family-sized dishes and the smaller one is perfect for a vegetable. They clean up easily. This set would make a perfect wedding gift!
customer_reviews.author: Etienne

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely, it took me a while to use them as they were so lovely. Nice size, easy to use, easy to wash and to store and they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and really nice for baking casseroles or deserts or maybe something else.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The set that I received is black. They are small, but very attractive on the table.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

product_meta.title: KINGSBULL HOME Baking Dish Ceramic Baking Set 2-Piece Baking Pans Porcelain Bakeware Black Lasagna Pan Casserole Dish
feature_bullets: 【MULTIFUNCTIONAL USE】 The baking dish are ideal for making and sharing gratin, roasted meat, lasagna, casseroles, brownies, desserts.  and It is safe for microwave and oven( 400 ℉ /204 ℃).
【HEALTHY MATERIALS】 The bakeware is made of durable porcelain, a type of premium LEAD-FREE and NON-TOXIC ceramic. Never worry about harmful toxins.

【SCIENTIFIC DESIGN】 Non-slip double handles for more safety. Please use the Anti-hot gloves (excludes) to take the baking pans out when it is still hot. The baking dish can nest within one another for convenient storage.

【CONVENIENT CLEANING】 Whether you want to clean the bakeware by hand or with your dishwasher, it won't matter because the smooth porcelain texture makes cleanup a breeze. and It is suitable for microwave, freezer and oven.In addition, baking, serving, storing, and reheating all in one dish.

【BEAUTIFUL PATTERN】 The baking set features unique pattern design and popular color for easy daily use. wavy side and hand painted flower pattern can be a charming decoration in your table and kitchen.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars123 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
